languages.text:
Блаженные-исповедники несут утешение экипажу и молятся во убережение корабля от козней Архиврага.
~// {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Уклонение{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагмана{/g} увеличено на +20% против врагов (Хаос)

Confessors from the ranks of the Touched offer solace to the crew and pray for the ship's safety from the Archenemy's machinations.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} gains a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} against Chaos enemies
languages.original_text:
Блаженные-исповедники несут утешение экипажу и молятся во убережение корабля от козней Архиврага.
~// {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Уклонение{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}флагмана{/g} увеличено на +20% против врагов (Хаос)

traits.locale_text: Confessors from the ranks of the Touched offer solace to the crew.
Confessors from the ranks of the Touched offer solace to the crew.

Confessors from the ranks of the Touched offer solace to the crew and pray for the ship's safety from the Archenemy's machinations.
~// The flagship gains a +20% bonus to evasion against chaos enemies

Confessors from the ranks of the Touched offer solace to the crew and pray for the ship's safety from the Archenemy's machinations.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} gains a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} against Chaos enemies

Confessors from the ranks of the Touched offer solace to the crew and pray for the ship's safety from the Archenemy's machinations.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} gains a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} against Chaos enemies

languages.text:
Des confesseurs issus des rangs des Illuminés apportent du réconfort à l'équipage et prient pour que le vaisseau survive aux manigances du Grand Ennemi.
~// Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} bénéficie d'un bonus à l'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évasion{/g} de +20 % contre les ennemis du Chaos.
languages.original_text:
Confessors from the ranks of the Touched offer solace to the crew and pray for the ship's safety from the Archenemy's machinations.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} gains a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} against Chaos enemies

traits.locale_text:
Des confesseurs issus des rangs des Illuminés apportent du réconfort à l'équipage et prient pour que le vaisseau survive aux manigances du Grand Ennemi.
~// Le {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}vaisseau amiral{/g} bénéficie d'un bonus à {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}l'évasion{/g} de +20 % contre les ennemis du Chaos.

languages.text:
触られし者の懺悔師たちがクルーに慰めを与え、渾沌の勢力による策略からの船の安全を祈る。
~//{g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗艦{/g}は渾沌の敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}回避{/g}+20%のボーナスを得る
languages.original_text:
Confessors from the ranks of the Touched offer solace to the crew and pray for the ship's safety from the Archenemy's machinations.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} gains a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} against Chaos enemies

traits.locale_text: 触られし者の懺悔師たちがクルーに慰めを与える。

触られし者の懺悔師たちがクルーに慰めを与え、渾沌の勢力による策略からの船の安全を祈る。
~//旗艦は渾沌の敵に対して回避+20%のボーナスを得る

languages.text:
受召者出身的告解者向船员们提供慰藉，在船上祈祷，让舰船免受混沌大敌的伤害。
~// {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}旗舰{/g}在对抗混沌敌人时，{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}闪避{/g}率提高20%。
languages.original_text:
Confessors from the ranks of the Touched offer solace to the crew and pray for the ship's safety from the Archenemy's machinations.
~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} gains a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} against Chaos enemies

traits.locale_text: 受召者出身的告解者向船员们提供慰藉。

受召者出身的告解者向船员们提供慰藉，在船上祈祷，让舰船免受混沌大敌的伤害。
~// 旗舰在对抗混沌敌人时，闪避率提高20%。

languages.text:
Confesores de las filas de los Tocados ofrecen consuelo a la tripulación y rezan para proteger la nave del Archienemigo.
~// La {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}nave insignia{/g} gana una bonificación de +20 % a {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}esquiva{/g} contra enemigos del Caos.
languages.original_text:

~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} gains a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} against Chaos enemies

traits.locale_text: Confesores de las filas de los Tocados ofrecen consuelo a la tripulación.

languages.text:
Konfessoren aus den Reihen der Berührten spenden der Crew Trost und beten für die Sicherheit des Schiffs vor den Machenschaften des Erzfeinds.
~// Das {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Flaggschiff{/g} erhält einen Bonus von +20 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen{/g} gegen Chaos-Feinde
languages.original_text:

~// The {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}flagship{/g} gains a +20% bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}evasion{/g} against Chaos enemies

languages.text:
Mütehassislerin saflarından günah çıkarıcılar, mürettebata teselli oluyor ve geminin Şerbaşı'nın gizli tertiplerinden korunması için dua ediyorlar.
~// {g|Encyclopedia:FlagshipSpace}Sancak gemisi{/g}, Kaos düşmanlarına karşı {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}sıyrılma{/g} değerine +%20 bonus kazanır
